ack.p: The authors acknowledge logistical support from Maria Cleide de Mendon√ßa at the Department of Entomology of the Museu Nacional/UFRJ, Rio de Janeiro, which was regretfully destroyed by a huge fire on September 2nd, 2018. The Department of Entomology, where most of the studied specimens were deposited, had more than 5 million specimens and was completely destroyed. We express our solidarity.
